Title: Chapter Eight: Know Your Truth
Writer: Alec Berg (created by), Alec Berg, Bill Hader (created by), Bill Hader
Actors: Bill Hader, Stephen Root, Sarah Goldberg, Glenn Fleshler
Plot: In the season finale, Barry vows to give up his life of crime. Elsewhere, Pazar enlists a replacement to take care of Fuches. Detective Moss closes in on an arrest that they hope will crack the Madison homicide case.
